[Home](./index.md) &gt; [@yext/sites-scripts](./sites-scripts.md)

## sites-scripts package

## Interfaces

| Interface                                                     | Description                                                                                                                                                                                                        |
| ------------------------------------------------------------- | ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------ |
| [HeadConfig](./sites-scripts.headconfig.md)                   | The configuration that allows users to entirely arbitarily set the inner contents of the head element that will be prepended to the generated HTML document.                                                       |
| [Stream](./sites-scripts.stream.md)                           | The stream config defined in [TemplateConfig.stream](./sites-scripts.templateconfig.stream.md)<!-- -->.                                                                                                            |
| [Tag](./sites-scripts.tag.md)                                 | Interface for an HTML tag. Can set attributes on the tag, but if a body needs to be defined, use the other field of the [HeadConfig](./sites-scripts.headconfig.md) interface.                                     |
| [TemplateConfig](./sites-scripts.templateconfig.md)           | The exported <code>config</code> function's definition.                                                                                                                                                            |
| [TemplateModule](./sites-scripts.templatemodule.md)           | The type to include in any template file. It defines the available functions and fields that are available to the template.                                                                                        |
| [TemplateProps](./sites-scripts.templateprops.md)             | The shape of the data passed directly to the different template functions with the exception of the render function (getPath, getHeadConfig, etc).                                                                 |
| [TemplateRenderProps](./sites-scripts.templaterenderprops.md) | The shape of the data passed directly to the template's render function. Extends the [TemplateProps](./sites-scripts.templateprops.md) interface and has the additions of a path and a relativePrefixToRoot field. |

## Variables

| Variable                                                                | Description                                                                                                                                                                             |
| ----------------------------------------------------------------------- | --------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- |
| [getLang](./sites-scripts.getlang.md)                                   | Function that takes in a [HeadConfig](./sites-scripts.headconfig.md) interface and a props, and returns the lang value that will be set on the HTML tag.                                |
| [renderHeadConfigToString](./sites-scripts.renderheadconfigtostring.md) | Function that takes a [HeadConfig](./sites-scripts.headconfig.md) interface and outputs a valid string of HTML that will be inserted into the generated document between the head tags. |

## Type Aliases

| Type Alias                                          | Description                                                                                                                                                                                                                             |
| --------------------------------------------------- | --------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- |
| [Attributes](./sites-scripts.attributes.md)         | Custom type for specifying HTML element attributes in the [Tag](./sites-scripts.tag.md) interface.                                                                                                                                      |
| [Default](./sites-scripts.default.md)               | The type definition for the template's default function.                                                                                                                                                                                |
| [GetHeadConfig](./sites-scripts.getheadconfig.md)   | The type definition for the template's getHeadConfig function. getHeadConfig takes in the provided data and will output a HeadConfig object which will be used to generate the tags inside the head tag of the generated HTML document. |
| [GetPath](./sites-scripts.getpath.md)               | The type definition for the template's getPath function.                                                                                                                                                                                |
| [GetRedirects](./sites-scripts.getredirects.md)     | The type definiton for the template's getRedirects function.                                                                                                                                                                            |
| [Manifest](./sites-scripts.manifest.md)             | A manifest of bundled files present during a production build.                                                                                                                                                                          |
| [Render](./sites-scripts.render.md)                 | The type definition for the template's render function.                                                                                                                                                                                 |
| [TagType](./sites-scripts.tagtype.md)               | Type that enumerates the allowed types of HTML elements in the document header.                                                                                                                                                         |
| [TransformProps](./sites-scripts.transformprops.md) | The type definition for the template's transformProps function. Can be used to alter and/or augement the props (which include the data document) passed into the template at render time.                                               |
